description.narrative: The project will contribute to achieve the following results: i)DTIS Concept note; ii) ToRs for all consultancies to be undertaken in the DTIS; iii) Presentations in Workshops during DTIS design and implementation; iv) Minutes of consultations on each of the DTIS chapters; v) DTIS dissemination strategy; vi) DTIS’s chapter Policy Briefing Notes; vii) DTIS Validation Workshops; viii) Validated DTIS and Action Matrix; and ix) Roadmap for policy reforms and implementation.

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
